reviews.review:
The action, the comedy is there in spades; and it's great. Tons of fanservice, especially for Marvel enthusiasts. But this movie is different. It's high stakes unlike any other previous Marvel. 
Thanos is a great villain. And the movie was much more emotional than I expected. All in all, my high expectations were met. And to say anything would ruin it. So enjoy and stay for the end credits!
Amazing movie. Great build up the last ten years. Cannot wait for part 2.

No Spoilers : This movie gives the gravity to the story that it deserves. It could have been safe to play down the evil, grief and cost of this mounting conflict, but the Russo Brothers held nothing back. The infinity Gauntlet is (and has been for 27 years) my favorite comic story ever. This is by no means a direct adaptation, but it is so well written. This will be an interesting year, after most of MCU phase 2 was lighter and more humorous, this movie hits you in the gut. Over and over!  The themes set up in the movie were beautifully integrated and (it seems to me)  it Layed the ground work for Avengers 4 to actually be deeper and more satisfying than the comic version. Despite several key players being absent, the roster they have were utilized perfectly! I can't wait to see it again, and I am so ready for the next chapter!
The new motivation for Thanos is so much better than the comic books. It almost makes Thanos seem like the good guy.
Can't wait until the next one comes out!!!

An amazing cinematic experience, stunning visuals  match the amazing soundtrack.  The story line will throw you for a curve ball again and again, For a 2 1/2 hour movie it went by so fast!  Can't wait for Avengers 4 :-)
by far the best MCU movie to date. Infinity War is right under Dark Knight as the best comic book movie of all time
Disney has the balls to kill off almost all of the marvel universe and it made me cry.
Absolutely insane, could not ask for more from Marvel.
4 out of 5 just because it ended strangely and thruoutout the movie it didn't really make sense but it is likeable but it's not as good as the media critics or who or whatever portrays it to be.
